Summary: V-shaped object, multicolored stationery object observed way up in the sky.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Bay City
There were no other sightings in Bay City on or around January 1st 2013
divs: sighting detailswhile looking at the moon from my living room window,(i live on the top floor of a five story apt. building.) i happened to notice a brightly lit star off to the southeast. when i looked through my binoculars, i noticed a multi-colored v-shaped object that was stationary. i'm reporting this right now as it's still just hovering there. it's way up!! don't know what it is, but i observed red blinking lights, along with a whole slew of different bright colors. i became excited as i do enjoy reading ufo articles. this is not my first sighting, and i made sure to anylize it thoroughly to rule out planes, stars, and\or helicopters. whatever it is it's still there. to the naked eye it looks like a bright star. not sure of the angle. only when looking through binoculars did the v-shaped object come into view properly. am going to keep watching until i cannot see it anymore, so maybe i can give a more detailed report. i tried getting a pic, or video of the object, but it's too far away, and my android phone doesn't have a zoom option. gonna try and put the viewfinder into the eyepiece of my binoculars. probably won't work but worth a try. ty
